title: standard
content: well im 16 and i hate high school every oe walks around with thara heads stuck way up there ass'es :) i mean that in a nice way. then im in the middle of a CBA and im doing it on the invenction of the tattoo gun and how it's effected people and i cant find any thing thats helped me so far all the sites have tried to sell me some bullshit on sale :( im doing research to day and wrighting the paper 2morrow im screwed royaly peace
author: dark_princess

comments.content:
[http://tattoos.lovetoknow.com/Tattoo\_Guns](http://web.archive.org/web/20101226062832/http:/tattoos.lovetoknow.com/Tattoo_Guns "http://tattoos.lovetoknow.com/Tattoo\_Guns")

Can't be that hard too search. The link above claims it was invented by Thomas Edison. Whooda thunk it. Combine that with some historical commentaries and you should be able to get enough info.
Libraries will have plenty of information on this topic, and are generally good places to do research.

i've gone to the libary and they block every thing, also were not alowed to use books. so that was a bust, and i needed it on how it impacted today's society but yeah i have to wright it todayu in about 3 hours about

I have never in my life heard of a library that blocks access to books, unless they are rare and extremely valuable.

You might just make one attempt at Wikipedia. It takes about 10 seconds. Spelling counts.
thank you for your help i passed the CBA with a B which is better then what i normaly do
